'''''The First and Second Ages''''' is a collection of the proceedings of the 5th Tolkien Society Workshop, held in Milton Keynes in 1990. It was published by [[The Tolkien Society]] in [[1992]] under the auspices of the [[Peter Roe Memorial Fund]] in [[1992]]; it was republished as a second edition in [[2020]].

==Contents==

*"From FÃ«anor to Doctor Faustus: A "Creator", destroys himself", by [[John Ellison]]
*"Before the Moon, Before the Sun: The Big Time in Tolkien's Mythology", by Denis Bridoux
*"Purity and Danger in Middle-earth", by [[Chris Seeman]]
*"'Good People' - Elves of the First Age", by [[Alex Lewis]]
